SDAccessErrorCardMissing: Cannot download file because the SD card is missing.
SDAccessErrorCardReadOnly: Cannot download file because the SD card is in use.
accessError:
%S could not be saved, because you cannot change the contents of that folder.

Change the folder properties and try again, or try saving in a different location.
diskFull:
There is not enough room on the disk to save %S.

Remove unnecessary files from the disk and try again, or try saving in a different location.
fileAlreadyExistsError:
%S could not be saved, because a file already exists with the same name as the '_files' directory.

Try saving to a different location.
fileNameTooLongError:
%S could not be saved, because the file name was too long.

Try saving with a shorter file name.
helperAppNotFound: %S could not be opened, because the associated helper application does not exist. Change the association in your preferences.
launchError:
%S could not be opened, because an unknown error occurred.

Try saving to disk first and then opening the file.
noMemory:
There is not sufficient memory to complete the action you requested.

Quit some applications and try again.
readError:
%S could not be saved, because the source file could not be read.

Try again later, or contact the server administrator.
readOnly:
%S could not be saved, because the disk, folder, or file is write-protected.

Write-enable the disk and try again, or try saving in a different location.
title: Downloading %S
writeError:
%S could not be saved, because an unknown error occurred.

Try saving to a different location.
